{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = Turris Omnia router plugged in.jpg |image1_size = 150px |caption = Open-source SOHO Network Router |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = <!-- product page url only --> |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = Turris_Omnia |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = Supported |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = CZ.NIC |model = Turris Omnia |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = RTROM01-1G |page_start_date = November 13, 2017 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/Turris_Omnia |wlclass = AC1750 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = wireless router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Marvell;88F6820;Armada 385; |cpu1_cores = 2 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A9 (v7) |cpu1spd = 1.6 GHz <!-- 1.6 / 1.8 / 2.0 GHz (1.33 GHz) --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = eMMC |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = SK hynix;; |flash1size = 8 GiB |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 1 GiB <!-- 2 GiB optionally --> |ram1chip = SK hynix;H5TC4G63CFR-PBA; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Marvell;88E6176;88E6176-TFJ2; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 5 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = D8:58:D7 |oui = 04:F0:21
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;;; |stockos = Linux;;OpenWrt-deriv;
|exp_if_types = Mini PCIe, USB 3.0, mSATA, SFP, SIM Card slot |exp_sim_num = 1 |exp_minipcie_num = 3 |exp_usb_num = 2 |exp_sata_num = 1 |exp_sfp_num = 1 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 3.33 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, populated,, 4-pin header,, (115200 8N1) |jtag = yes,, populated,, 20-pin header
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = metal case, RTC, heatsink |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac
|defaulip = 192.168.1.1 |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = Turris |defaultssid_regex = ^Turris$ |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = OpenWrt
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B01MG47OY3 |asin_country = DE |asin2 = B01M7TNEP3 |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = <!-- Country device was manufactured in -->
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = Compex WLE200N2 |rad1modif = Mini PCIe (half) |rad1chip1 = Atheros;AR9287; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL, RP-SMA |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
|wi2_if_name = |rad2mod = Compex WLE900VX |rad2modif = Mini PCIe |rad2chip1 = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA9880 v2;QCA9880-BR4A; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad2txchains = 3 |rad2rxchains = 3 |rad2sstreams = 3 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad2ac = 1300 |rad2n = 450 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== [https://omnia.turris.cz/en/ Product page] (EN) {{•}} [https://www.turris.cz/doc/en/start Documentation] {{•}}[https://www.turris.cz/doc/_media/rtrom01-schema.pdf Schematics] :{{WPLink|Turris Omnia}}
Specifications, per their product page... *There are two variants of the Omnia - one with 1GiB and another with 2GiB RAM *3x MiniPCIe (1x MiniPCIe/mSATA)
Wireless modules used are per the below image, the one shown on Wikipedia.
==Links of Interest== *[https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/turris-omnia-hi-performance-open-source-router-security-network '''Indiegogo''' campaign] *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2015/10/15/turris-omnia-is-a-feature-packed-openwrt-router-board-powered-by-marvell-armada-385-processor/ ''Turris Omnia'' on '''SNX-Software'''] :ARMADA 385 SoC (88F6820) *[https://lede-project.org/toh/hwdata/turris/turris_turris_omnia '''LEDE Project''' HWDATA] :Power specifications are per LEDE's HWDATA *[https://forum.turris.cz/t/m-2-or-msata-drive-for-omnia/1026 ''M.2 or mSATA drive for Omnia'' on '''Turris''' forums] *[http://www.bortzmeyer.org/turris.html ''Turris''] [http://www.bortzmeyer.org/turris-bis.html ''Omnia'' on '''Bortzmeyer'''] ([http://www.bortzmeyer.org/images/turris-inside-with-msata.jpg internal image]) :RAM: ''SK hynix'' H5TC4G63CFR or ''Micron'' MT41K256M16HA
==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/turris/turris_turris_omnia |wikipage = https://openwrt.org/toh/turris/turris_omnia |forumpage = |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = mvebu |subtarget = cortexa9 |arch = arm_cortex-a9_vfpv3 |support_started_version = 18.06.0 |current_supported_version = 23.05.4 |image_too_big = |unsupportedfuncntions = RGB LED, secondary CPU uplink to switch |comment = Turris OS 3.x uses an operating system based on OpenWrt, see https://github.com/CZ-NIC/turris-os; Turris OS 4.x is based on top of OpenWrt, see https://gitlab.labs.nic.cz/turris/turris-build; 1024MB RAM version was also available }} Please insert instructions here
==Pictures== ===Wikipedia images (from Lklundin, CC-BY-SA 4.0)=== [[File:Turris Omnia router plugged in.jpg|300px|unit]] [[File:Turris_Omnia_router_without_cover_3.jpg|300px|board]]
==Notes== ===Wireless module compatibility=== Some wireless modules, do not currently seem to play nice with the Omnia - they are simply not detected at all.
====Tested as non-recognized (possibly non-working)==== * [[Atheros AR5BXB6]] (AR5424 [abg]) ref. design ** [[Apple AR5BXB6]] ** [[Foxconn T60H921.05 (IBM)]] * [[Atheros AR5BHB63]] (AR2425 [bg]) ref. design ** unknown module, IBM FRU 43Y6511 * [[Atheros AR5B91]] (AR9281 [bgn, 1x2], half+full) ref. design ** [[Askey WLL6080]] * [[Atheros AR5BXB92]] (AR9280 [abgn, 2x2], full-size) ref. design ** [[Ubiquiti Networks SR71-E]] ** [[Foxconn U98Z044.00 (HP)]] * [[Intel PRO/Wireless 3945ABG]] * [[Intel Wireless WiFi Link 4965AGN]] ====Tested as recognized (possibly working)==== * [[Atheros AR5B95]] (AR9285 [bgn, 1x1]) ref. design ** [[Foxconn T77H047.31]] * [[Atheros AR5B97]] (AR9287 [bgn, 2x2]) ref. design ** [[Compex WLE200N2]], literally included with the unit * [[Atheros AR5B22]] (AR9462 [abgn, 2x2]) ref. design ** [[Foxconn T77H348.02]] * [[Atheros AR5BHB116]] (AR9382 [abgn, 2x2]) ref. design ** [[SparkLAN WPEA-121N]]/W * [[MikroTik R11e-2HnD]] (AR9582 [bgn, 2x2]) * [[MikroTik R11e-5HnD]] (AR9582 [an, 2x2]) * [[Compex WLE900VX]] (QCA9880v2 [abgn+ac, 3x3]), literally included with the unit * [[Intel WiFi Link 5100 (abgn, full size)]] * [[Intel WiFi Link 5300 (full size)]] * [[Intel Centrino Advanced-N 6200 (622ANHMW)]] * [[Intel Centrino Ultimate-N 6300]] * [[Lite-On WCBN607RH-H1 (HP)]] (RT3592, [abgn, 2x2])
[[Category:English Documentation]]
